title: Build an App
description: Design and build an app that has at least one banner, label, and button. You might design a weather app, an about me app, or any other app that interests you. Your goal is to add user interface elements to display information.
hint:
Drag over some of the action blocks for the program and set the parameters for each. The following are the locations for a few images.
